DOC.brief_summary: During penile prosthesis surgery , participant give general anesthesia combination pain drug . A caudal nerve block ( CNB ) local anesthetic inject near tailbone , addition general anesthesia , low need pain drug . The goal clinical research study learn effective CNBs participant penile prosthesis surgery compare participant general anesthesia study long participant stay hospital level pain surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Use Caudal Nerve Blocks Adult Penile Prosthesis
DOC.detailed_description: Study Groups CNB Administration : If participant find eligible take part study , randomly assign ( flip coin ) 1 2 study group . Participant equal chance assign either group . - If participant assign Group 1 , receive CNB general anesthesia surgery . - If participant assign Group 2 , receive general anesthesia surgery . Participant know group assign . The CNB give participant general anesthesia . To receive CNB , special needle insert low part back ( near tailbone ) . A type local anesthesia inject sac surround spinal cord contain nerve related penis . All participant also receive general anesthesia part standard care . Participant also receive separate consent form surgery explain procedure risk , include risk general anesthesia . After Surgery Data Collection : During 24 hour surgery , study staff ask participant rate pain scale 0-10 . Participant ask rate pain every 30 minute hospital , may ask rate pain often need . It take less 5 minute time rate participant 's pain . Depending participant rate pain , additional pain drug may give part standard care . If participant discharge hospital day surgery discharge member staff ask rate pain , study staff call participant within 24 hour discharge hospital . This call last 5-10 minute . The amount pain drug give participant , , surgery also record . About 3 day participant 's surgery , study staff call ask pain , amount pain drug take , satisfied type anesthesia pain control receive . This call last 5-10 minute . Length Study : Patient 's participation study phone call 3 day surgery complete . This investigational study . The general anesthesia CNB use study FDA approve commercially available . It consider investigational compare effectiveness CNBs penile prosthesis surgery general anesthesia alone . The study doctor explain study drug design work . Up 104 participant enrol study . All take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients consent participate . 2 . Patients undergo penile prosthesis surgery . 3 . Patients male . 4 . Patients 18 year age old . 1 . Patients chronic pain medication ( ie . Chronic = every two day great 2 week ) exclude Aspirin , Acetaminophen NSAIDs . 2 . Patients BMI > 40 . 3 . Patients chronic pain syndrome . 4 . Patients hypersensitivity Ropivacaine/amidetype anesthetic . 5 . Prior surgery sacrum . 6 . Patients take anticoagulant blood thin medication prior surgery specified time frame : ) Low molecular weight heparin le 36 hour prior surgery . ii ) Coumadin le 5 day prior surgery . iii ) Plavix NSAIDs less 7 day prior surgery . 7 . Patients antiseizure medication , gabapentin Lyrica , specifically chronic pain management le 24 hour prior surgery 8 . Patients Celebrex le 24 hour prior surgery 9 . Patients take 81 mg Aspirin daily
